verses.verse: Πᾶς <WG3956> Pas Every ( The Perfect High Priest) γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἀρχιερεὺς <WG749> archiereus high priest ἐξ <WG1537> ex from among ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn men λαμβανόμενος <WG2983> lambanomenos vvv ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper to represent ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn [them] καθίσταται <WG2525> kathistatai is appointed τὰ <WG3588> ta in matters πρὸς <WG4314> pros relating to τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God , ἵνα <WG2443> hina to προσφέρῃ <WG4374> prospherē offer δῶρά <WG1435> dōra gifts τε <WG5037> te - καὶ <WG2532> kai and θυσίας <WG2378> thysias sacrifices ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for ἁμαρτιῶν <WG266> hamartiōn sins .

μετριοπαθεῖν <WG3356> metriopathein to deal gently δυνάμενος <WG1410> dynamenos He is able τοῖς <WG3588> tois with those who ἀγνοοῦσιν <WG50> agnoousin are ignorant καὶ <WG2532> kai and πλανωμένοις <WG4105> planōmenois misguided , ἐπεὶ <WG1893> epei since καὶ <WG2532> kai - αὐτὸς <WG846> autos he himself περίκειται <WG4029> perikeitai is beset by ἀσθένειαν <WG769> astheneian weakness .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - δι’ <WG1223> di’ That is why αὐτὴν <WG846> autēn . . . ὀφείλει <WG3784> opheilei he is obligated καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as well as περὶ <WG4012> peri for [the sins of] τοῦ <WG3588> tou the λαοῦ <WG2992> laou people . οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs - καὶ <WG2532> kai - περὶ <WG4012> peri for αὑτοῦ* <WG846> hautou his own προσφέρειν <WG4374> prospherein to offer sacrifices περὶ <WG4012> peri - ἁμαρτιῶν <WG266> hamartiōn sins ,

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - οὐχ <WG3756> ouch No ἑαυτῷ <WG1438> heautō upon himself ; τις <WG5100> tis one λαμβάνει <WG2983> lambanei takes τὴν <WG3588> tēn [this] τιμήν <WG5092> timēn honor ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla - καλούμενος <WG2564> kaloumenos he must be called ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo by τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God , καθώσπερ <WG2531> kathōsper just as καὶ <WG2532> kai [was] . Ἀαρών <WG2> Aarōn Aaron

Οὕτως <WG3779> Houtōs So καὶ <WG2532> kai also ὁ <WG3588> ho - Χριστὸς <WG5547> Christos Christ οὐχ <WG3756> ouch did not ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton . . . ἐδόξασεν <WG1392> edoxasen take upon Himself the glory γενηθῆναι <WG1096> genēthēnai of becoming ἀρχιερέα <WG749> archierea a high priest , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but [He was called] ὁ <WG3588> ho by the [One who] λαλήσας <WG2980> lalēsas said πρὸς <WG4314> pros to αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him : Υἱός <WG5207> Huios Son ; μου <WG1473> mou My εἶ <WG1510> ei are σύ <WG4771> sy “ You ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I σήμερον <WG4594> sēmeron today γεγέννηκά <WG1080> gegennēka have become Your Father σε <WG4771> se . . . .” ( ; literally today I have begotten You)

Καθὼς <WG2531> Kathōs . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐν <WG1722> en in ἑτέρῳ <WG2087> heterō another [passage] λέγει <WG3004> legei [God] says : Σὺ <WG4771> Sy “ You [are] ἱερεὺς <WG2409> hiereus a priest εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τὸν <WG3588> ton vvv αἰῶνα <WG165> aiōna forever κατὰ <WG2596> kata in τὴν <WG3588> tēn the τάξιν <WG5010> taxin order Μελχισέδεκ <WG3198> Melchisedek of Melchizedek .” ( )

Ὃς <WG3739> Hos - ἐν <WG1722> en During ταῖς <WG3588> tais the ἡμέραις <WG2250> hēmerais days τῆς <WG3588> tēs of σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos earthly [life] , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Jesus’] δεήσεις <WG1162> deēseis prayers τε <WG5037> te - καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἱκετηρίας <WG2428> hiketērias petitions πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton the [One who] δυνάμενον <WG1410> dynamenon could σῴζειν <WG4982> sōzein save αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him ἐκ <WG1537> ek from θανάτου <WG2288> thanatou death , μετὰ <WG3326> meta with κραυγῆς <WG2906> kraugēs cries ἰσχυρᾶς <WG2478> ischyras loud καὶ <WG2532> kai and δακρύων <WG1144> dakryōn tears προσενέγκας <WG4374> prosenenkas He offered up καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἰσακουσθεὶς <WG1522> eisakoustheis He was heard ἀπὸ <WG575> apo because of τῆς <WG3588> tēs [His] εὐλαβείας <WG2124> eulabeias reverence .

καίπερ <WG2539> kaiper Although ὢν <WG1510> ōn He was Υἱός <WG5207> Huios a Son , ἔμαθεν <WG3129> emathen He learned ἀφ’ <WG575> aph’ from ὧν <WG3739> hōn what ἔπαθεν <WG3958> epathen He suffered . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ὑπακοήν <WG5218> hypakoēn obedience

καὶ <WG2532> kai And τελειωθεὶς <WG5048> teleiōtheis having been made perfect , ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto He became πᾶσιν <WG3956> pasin to all τοῖς <WG3588> tois who ὑπακούουσιν <WG5219> hypakouousin obey αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him αἴτιος <WG159> aitios [the] source σωτηρίας <WG4991> sōtērias salvation αἰωνίου <WG166> aiōniou of eternal

Περὶ <WG4012> Peri about οὗ <WG3739> hou [this] , πολὺς <WG4183> polys much ( Milk and Solid Food) ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin We [have] ὁ <WG3588> ho - λόγος <WG3056> logos to say καὶ <WG2532> kai [but it is] δυσερμήνευτος <WG1421> dysermēneutos hard to explain λέγειν <WG3004> legein . . . , ἐπεὶ <WG1893> epei because νωθροὶ <WG3576> nōthroi dull γεγόνατε <WG1096> gegonate you are ταῖς <WG3588> tais of ἀκοαῖς <WG189> akoais hearing .

( Or of the oracles of God) τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God’s καὶ <WG2532> kai - γεγόνατε <WG1096> gegonate vvv χρείαν <WG5532> chreian You need ἔχοντες <WG2192> echontes vvv γάλακτος <WG1051> galaktos milk , [καὶ] <WG2532> kai - οὐ <WG3756> ou not στερεᾶς <WG4731> stereas solid τροφῆς <WG5160> trophēs food !
